name: Automator Converter Action
summary: Conversion action performed by Automator, an Apple OS X program; bridges actions whose types of provided data (AMProvides property) and accepted data (AMAccepts) do not match; installed in the same system directories ACTION files are located, e.g., /​System/​Library/​Automator folder; users are usually unaware of this file because Automator converts between actions automatically and does not display the conversion actions.
